definition:
Select sti.GTD_SIT_ID_SEQ,
        sti.SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
        sti.TITLE,
        sti.FILM_DESC,
        sti.FILM,
        sti.PHOTO,
        sti.EXTRACT,
        sti.SALE_CONSUMER,
        sti.DATE_CONSUMER,
        sti.SALE_INSTITUTIONAL,
        sti.DATE_INSTITUTIONAL,
        reg.TYPE_OBJECT,
        reg.TYPE_SOURCE,
        reg.INVENTORY_NO,
        reg.PROJECT_NO,
        reg.TITLE_CODE,
        reg.SORT_KEY_TITLE,
        reg.FINAL_TITLE,
        reg.WORKING_TITLE,
        reg.NFB_PRODUCTION,
        reg.PRODUCTION_YEAR,
        reg.TITLE_RUNNING_TIME,
        reg.TITLE_FOOTAGE,
        reg.SYN_LAN_ID_SEQ,
        reg.NOTES,
        fmt.master_seq_number         MSN
   From GTD_SITE_TITLE sti,
        SYN_REGISTERY  reg,
        FMT_FORMAT     fmt
  Where reg.id_seq = sti.syn_reg_id_seq
    and reg.id_seq = fmt.syn_reg_id_seq(+)

Select sti.GTD_SIT_ID_SEQ,
        sti.SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
        sti.TITLE,
        sti.FILM_DESC,
        sti.FILM,
        sti.PHOTO,
        sti.EXTRACT,
        sti.SALE_CONSUMER,
        sti.DATE_CONSUMER,
        sti.SALE_INSTITUTIONAL,
        sti.DATE_INSTITUTIONAL,
        reg.TYPE_OBJECT,
        reg.TYPE_SOURCE,
        reg.INVENTORY_NO,
        reg.PROJECT_NO,
        reg.TITLE_CODE,
        reg.SORT_KEY_TITLE,
        reg.FINAL_TITLE,
        reg.WORKING_TITLE,
        reg.NFB_PRODUCTION,
        reg.PRODUCTION_YEAR,
        reg.TITLE_RUNNING_TIME,
        reg.TITLE_FOOTAGE,
        reg.SYN_LAN_ID_SEQ,
        reg.NOTES,
        fmt.master_seq_number         MSN
   From GTP_SITE_TITLE sti,
        SYN_REGISTERY  reg,
        FMT_FORMAT     fmt
  Where reg.id_seq = sti.syn_reg_id_seq
    and reg.id_seq = fmt.syn_reg_id_seq(+)

SELECT
    A.GTD_SIT_ID_SEQ,
    A.SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
    nvl(b.film_desc,A.FILM_DESC) FILM_DESC,
    nvl(b.film,A.FILM) FILM,
    nvl(b.photo,A.PHOTO) PHOTO,
    nvl(b.EXTRACT,A.EXTRACT) EXTRACT,
    nvl(b.sale_consumer,A.SALE_CONSUMER) SALE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.date_consumer,A.DATE_CONSUMER) DATE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.sale_institutional,A.SALE_INSTITUTIONAL) SALE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.date_institutional,A.DATE_INSTITUTIONAL)DATE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.created_by,a.CREATED_BY) CREATED_BY,
    nvl(b.creation_date,a.CREATION_DATE) CREATION_DATE,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATED_BY,a.LAST_UPDATED_BY) LAST_UPDATED_BY,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,a.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
    nvl(b.TITLE,a.title) title
 FROM RIGHTS.GTD_SITE_TITLE a,
     RIGHTS.GTP_SITE_TITLE b
    where decode(a.gtd_sit_id_seq,1,5,a.gtd_sit_id_seq)=b.gtd_sit_id_seq(+)
    and a.syn_reg_id_seq=b.syn_reg_id_seq(+)

SELECT
    A.GTD_SIT_ID_SEQ,
    A.SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
    nvl(b.film_desc,A.FILM_DESC) FILM_DESC,
    nvl(b.film,A.FILM) FILM,
    nvl(b.photo,A.PHOTO) PHOTO,
    nvl(b.EXTRACT,A.EXTRACT) EXTRACT,
    nvl(b.sale_consumer,A.SALE_CONSUMER) SALE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.date_consumer,A.DATE_CONSUMER) DATE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.sale_institutional,A.SALE_INSTITUTIONAL) SALE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.date_institutional,A.DATE_INSTITUTIONAL)DATE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.created_by,a.CREATED_BY) CREATED_BY,
    nvl(b.creation_date,a.CREATION_DATE) CREATION_DATE,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATED_BY,a.LAST_UPDATED_BY) LAST_UPDATED_BY,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,a.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
    nvl(b.TITLE,a.title) title
 FROM RIGHTS.GTD_SITE_TITLE a,
     RIGHTS.GTP_SITE_TITLE b
    where a.gtd_sit_id_seq=b.gtd_sit_id_seq(+)
    and a.syn_reg_id_seq=b.syn_reg_id_seq(+)

SELECT
    B.GTD_SIT_ID_SEQ,
    A.SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
    nvl(b.film_desc,A.FILM_DESC) FILM_DESC,
    nvl(b.film,A.FILM) FILM,
    nvl(b.photo,A.PHOTO) PHOTO,
    nvl(b.EXTRACT,A.EXTRACT) EXTRACT,
    nvl(b.sale_consumer,A.SALE_CONSUMER) SALE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.date_consumer,A.DATE_CONSUMER) DATE_CONSUMER,
    nvl(b.sale_institutional,A.SALE_INSTITUTIONAL) SALE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.date_institutional,A.DATE_INSTITUTIONAL)DATE_INSTITUTIONAL,
    nvl(b.created_by,a.CREATED_BY) CREATED_BY,
    nvl(b.creation_date,a.CREATION_DATE) CREATION_DATE,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATED_BY,a.LAST_UPDATED_BY) LAST_UPDATED_BY,
    nvl(b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,a.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
    nvl(b.TITLE,a.title) title
 FROM RIGHTS.GTD_SITE_TITLE a,
     RIGHTS.GTP_SITE_TITLE b
    where a.gtd_sit_id_seq=6
	and b.gtd_sit_id_seq = 11
    and a.syn_reg_id_seq=b.syn_reg_id_seq(+)

SELECT title_name, syn_reg_id_seq, syn_reg_id_seq_original, right_holder_name,
       rig_ven_id_seq, contract_id, contract_no,
       rig_con_start_date, rig_con_end_date,
       rig_con_last_update_date, t_id_seq, syn_ter_id_seq,
       rig_ste_id_seq, syn_ter_code, type_territory,
       syn_ter_desc, syn_lan_id_seq, syn_lan_code,
       rig_ter_start_date, rig_ter_end_date,
       rig_ter_last_update_date, m_id_seq, rig_mar_id_seq,
       rig_mar_desc, rig_mar_code, rig_mar_start_date,
       rig_mar_end_date, rig_mar_last_update_date, last_update_date
  FROM coll_rig_contract_partenaire_v

Select a.Id_Seq,
       a.Code,
       a.Start_Date,
       a.End_Date,
       a.Report_Name_Eng,
       a.Report_Name_Fre,
       b.Description
   From rig_Contract_Type    a,
        rig_Contract_Type_TL b
  Where a.Id_seq               = b.rig_Ctp_Id_Seq(+)
    and b.FND_LAN_NLS_LANGUAGE = Substr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),1,Instr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),'_')-1)

Select a.Id_seq,
       a.Code,
       b.Description
  From Rig_Domain     a,
       Rig_Domain_Tl  b
 Where a.Domain               = 'RIG_LEAF_SALE_QUALIFIER.RIGHT_QUALIFIER'
   and a.Id_seq               = b.Rig_Dom_Id_Seq
   and b.FND_LAN_NLS_LANGUAGE = Substr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),1,Instr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),'_')-1)

SELECT
    a.Id_Seq,
    a.Code,
    a.start_date,
    a.end_date,
    b.Description
 FROM Rig_Market       a,
      Rig_Market_TL    b
 Where a.Id_seq                  = b.Rig_Mar_Id_Seq(+)
   and b.FND_LAN_NLS_LANGUAGE(+) = Substr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),1,Instr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),'_')-1)

Select Con.Id_Seq                 Rig_Con_Id_Seq,
       Con.Rig_Ctp_Id_Seq         Rig_Ctp_Id_Seq,
       Con.Contract_No            Contract_No,
       Con.Amendment_No           Amendment_No,
       Con.Contract_Status        Contract_Status,
       Con.Total_Amount           Total_Amount, 
       Con.Total_Amount_Cad       Total_Amount_Cad,
       Con.curr_code              Curr_Code,
       Con.Signed_Date            Signed_Date,
       Ltf.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq         Rig_Tir_Id_Seq,
       Ltn.Id_Seq                 Rig_Lti_Id_Seq,
       Lti.Syn_Reg_Id_Seq         Syn_Reg_Id_Seq,
       Lti.Advance_Amt            Advance_Amt,
       Lsn.Id_Seq                 Rig_Lsq_Id_Seq,
       Lsq.Id_Seq                 Rig_Lsq_Node_Id_Seq, 
       Lsq.Sale_Type              Sale_Type,
       Lsq.Start_Date             Start_Date,
       Lsq.End_Date               End_Date,
       Lsq.Date_Validated         Date_Validated,
       Lsq.Date_Reserved          Date_Reserved,
       Lsq.Nb_Days_Reserved       Nb_Days_Reserved,
       Lsq.Date_Released          Date_Released
  From Rig_Contract               Con   -- Contract
      ,Rig_Contract_Section       Cse   -- Contract Section
      ,Rig_Tree_Rights_V          Ltf   -- Level Title Folder
      ,Rig_Tree_Rights_V          Ltn   --       Title Node
      ,Rig_Leaf_Title             Lti   --       Leaf Title    
      ,Rig_Tree_Rights_V          Lsf   -- Level Sale Qualifier Folder
      ,Rig_Tree_Rights_V          Lsn   --       Sale Qualifier Node
      ,Rig_Leaf_Sale_Qualifier    Lsq   --       Leaf Sale Qualifier
 Where Con.Id_Seq           = Cse.Rig_Con_Id_Seq
   And Ltf.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq   = Cse.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq 
   And Ltf.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 19
   And Ltf.Node_Id_seq      Is Null
   And Ltn.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 19
   And Ltn.Id_Seq_parent    = Ltf.Id_Seq
   And Ltn.Id_Seq           = Lti.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq
   And Lsf.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 22
   And Lsf.Id_Seq_Parent    = Ltn.Id_Seq
   And Lsf.Node_Id_seq      Is Null   
   And Lsn.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 22
   And Lsn.Id_Seq_parent    = Lsf.Id_Seq    
   And Lsn.Id_Seq           = Lsq.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq

Select Tri.Rig_Lsq_Id_Seq  Rig_Lsq_Id_Seq,
       Ltx.Syn_Ter_Id_Seq  T_Id,
       Llx.Syn_Lan_Id_Seq  L_Id,
       Lmx.Rig_Mar_Id_Seq  M_Id,
       Lsx.Rig_Sup_Id_Seq  S_Id,
       Nvl(Lsx.Quantity,0) S_Qty
  From
     (SELECT  Ltf.Id_Seq_Parent        Rig_Lsq_Id_Seq,    
              Ltn.id_seq               T_Id_Seq,
              Lmn.id_seq               M_Id_Seq,
              Lsn.id_seq               S_Id_Seq
         FROM Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LTF,       -- Level Territory Folder
              Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LTN,       --       Territory Node
              Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LMF,       -- Level Market Folder
              Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LMN,       --       Market Node
              Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LSF,       -- Level Support Folder
              Rig_Tree_Rights_V        LSN        --       Support Node
        Where Ltf.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 4
          And Ltf.Node_Id_seq      Is Null
          And Ltn.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 4
          And Ltn.Id_Seq_parent    = Ltf.Id_Seq
          And Lmf.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 5
          And Lmf.Id_Seq_Parent    = Ltn.Id_Seq
          And Lmf.Node_Id_seq      Is Null   
          And Lmn.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 5
          And Lmn.Id_Seq_parent    = Lmf.Id_Seq   
          And Lsf.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 14
          And Lsf.Id_Seq_Parent    = Lmn.Id_Seq
          And Lsf.Node_Id_seq      Is Null   
          And Lsn.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq   = 14
          And Lsn.Id_Seq_parent    = Lsf.Id_Seq )Tri
     ,Rig_Sale_Leaf_Terr_v                       Ltx   --  Territory Leaf (extended)
     ,Rig_Sale_Leaf_Lang_v                       Llx   --  Language Leaf (extended)    
     ,Rig_Sale_Leaf_Mark_v                       Lmx   --  Market Leaf (extended)    
     ,Rig_Sale_Leaf_Supp_v                       Lsx   --  Support Leaf (extended)
 Where Tri.T_Id_seq      = Ltx.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq 
   And Tri.T_Id_seq      = Llx.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq  
   And Tri.M_Id_seq      = Lmx.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq 
   And Tri.S_Id_seq      = Lsx.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq

SELECT DISTINCT
       right_holder_name,
       rig_ven_id_seq
  FROM rig_contract_partenaire_v

select '1'  Seq,
       SYN_REG_ID_SEQ_REFERENCE            SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
       Type_Relation                       Type_Relation,
       SYN_REG_ID_SEQ                      SYN_REG_ID_SEQ_REF
  from SYN_REGISTERY_RELATION
 Where type_relation In ('PART_SERIE', 'PART_COMPILATION', 'PART_ENSEMBLE','PART_FINANCE')
UNION
select '2'  Seq,
       SYN_REG_ID_SEQ                      SYN_REG_ID_SEQ,
       Type_Relation                       Type_Relation,
       SYN_REG_ID_SEQ_REFERENCE            SYN_REG_ID_SEQ_REF
  from SYN_REGISTERY_RELATION
 Where type_relation In ('PART_SERIE', 'PART_COMPILATION', 'PART_ENSEMBLE')

Select a.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq,
       b.Element_Id_Seq Syn_Lan_Id_Seq
  From Rig_Leaf_Territory   a,
       Rig_Extend_Tlms      b      
 Where b.grp_code = 'L'
   And b.grp_id_seq = Nvl(a.Syn_Lan_Id_Seq,0) + Nvl(a.Rig_Sla_Id_Seq+500000,0)

Select a.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq,
       b.Element_Id_Seq Rig_Mar_Id_Seq
  From Rig_Leaf_Market    a,
       Rig_Extend_Tlms    b      
 Where b.grp_code = 'M'
   And b.grp_id_seq = Nvl(a.Rig_Mar_Id_Seq,0) + Nvl(a.Rig_Smk_Id_Seq+500000,0)

Select a.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq,
       b.Element_Id_Seq Rig_Sup_Id_Seq,
       a.Quantity
  From Rig_Leaf_Support   a,
       Rig_Extend_Tlms    b      
 Where b.grp_code = 'S'
   And b.grp_id_seq = Nvl(a.Rig_Sup_Id_Seq,0) + Nvl(a.Rig_Ssu_Id_Seq+500000,0)

Select a.Rig_Tri_Id_Seq,
       b.Element_Id_Seq Syn_Ter_Id_Seq
  From Rig_Leaf_Territory   a,
       Rig_Extend_Tlms      b      
 Where b.grp_code = 'T'
   And b.grp_id_seq = Nvl(a.Syn_Ter_Id_Seq,0) + Nvl(a.Rig_Ste_Id_Seq+500000,0)

SELECT
    a.Id_Seq,
    a.Code,
    a.start_date,
    a.end_date,
    a.product_code,
    b.Description
 FROM Rig_Support       a,
      Rig_Support_TL    b
 Where a.Id_seq                  = b.Rig_Sup_Id_Seq(+)
   and b.FND_LAN_NLS_LANGUAGE(+) = Substr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),1,Instr(Userenv('LANGUAGE'),'_')-1)

SELECT DISTINCT
       title_name,
       syn_reg_id_seq
  FROM rig_contract_partenaire_v

Select '1' Seq,
       a.Id_Seq,
       a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq,
       b.Syn_Reg_Id_Seq,
       '»'||a.type_relation,
       a.Syn_Reg_Id_Seq
  FROM rig_title_relations a,
       rig_title_rights    b
 Where a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq = b.Id_Seq
    And a.Type_Relation = 'SEE_ALSO'
UNION
Select '2' Seq,
       a.Id_Seq,
       a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq,
       a.Syn_Reg_Id_Seq,
       a.type_relation,
       b.Syn_Reg_Id_Seq
  FROM rig_title_relations a,
       rig_title_rights    b
 Where a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq = b.Id_Seq
    And a.Type_Relation = 'SEE_ALSO'

Select a.Id_Seq,
       a.Id_Seq_Parent,
       a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq,
       a.Rig_Tst_Id_Seq,
       a.Node_Id_Seq,
       d.Id_Seq Rig_Cse_Id_Seq,
       d.Rig_Con_Id_Seq,
       b.Customer_Id,
       b.Customer_Site_Id,       
       b.Gst_No,
       b.Corporate_No,
       b.Sign_Name,
       b.Sign_Title,       
       b.Represented_by, 
       b.Undef_Ind, 
       b.Undef_Address,
       b.Tel_No,
       b.Fax_No,
       b.Email,
       c.Branch_Code
  From Rig_Tree_Rights        a,
       Rig_Leaf_Distributor   b,
       Rig_Tree_Structure     c,
       Rig_Contract_Section   d
 Where a.Rig_Tst_Id_Seq       = c.Id_Seq
   and c.Rig_Lft_Id_Seq       in (18,41) -- Leaf Distributor or Partner
   and a.Node_Id_Seq          = b.Id_Seq
   And a.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq       = d.Rig_Tir_Id_Seq

Select a.id_seq, 
       a.id_seq_parent, 
       a.rig_tir_id_seq, 
       a.rig_tst_id_seq,
       a.node_id_seq,
       b.rig_lft_id_seq
  From rig_tree_rights    a,
       Rig_Tree_Structure b
 Where a.Rig_Tst_Id_Seq = b.Id_Seq
